content: On slide 10, our fourth quarter results reflect the market opportunity we seized by accelerating our investment in equipment with average OEC fleet up 31% over last year's comparable period. As we've discussed, Herc's rental revenue growth is eclipsing the broader industry growth rate by a factor of two times to three times whether you focus on 2022's total topline increase of 34% or our organic growth rate of over 20%. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
